sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_mab_api.DuplicateConfigMap</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>DuplicateConfigMap</name> <script><![CDATA[// The purpose of this class is to hold constants that power how duplicate works, e.g. providing exceptions to renaming of records, which descendant records to reuse. // The data is returned directly to the frontend, and have table names pre camelCased for that purpose.
var DuplicateConfigMap = Class.create(); DuplicateConfigMap.prototype = { initialize: function() { // Not all name fields are string/text inputs, we want to hold a list of tables to exclude renaming this.recordsNotToRename = [ 'sysSgButtonAttribute', 'sysSgButtonInstance', 'sysSgFilterConditionAttribute', 'sysSgInput', 'sysSgInputAttribute', 'sysSgItemParameter', 'sysSgItemSortingAttribute', 'sysSgSectionAttribute', 'sysSgUiParameter', 'sysSgVariable', 'sysSgVariableAttribute', 'sysSgViewConfigElementAttribute', 'sysSgViewConfigField', ];
// Some tables don't have name fields, but there is another key that's a string/text/textarea field that MAB // is using as display this.altNameFieldMap = { sysSgAppletLauncherHeader: 'text', sysSgAppletLauncherTab: 'label', sysSgAppletTab: 'label', sysSgChartSection: 'title', sysSgContentSection: 'title', sysSgFavoritesTab: 'label', sysSgIconSection: 'title', sysSgItemSection: 'title', sysSgMediaSection: 'title', sysSgNavigationSection: 'title', sysSgNotificationsTab: 'label', sysSgSettingsTab: 'label', };
// Depending on the root record being duplicated, there are certain children or descendants that should not // be duplicated but reused. In snake case since this powers both UI and API this.descendantsToReuse = { all: [ 'sys_sg_card_size', 'sys_sg_input_type', 'sys_sg_view_template', ], sys_sg_list_screen: [ 'sys_sg_filter', 'sys_sg_button', 'sys_sg_list_screen', 'sys_sg_map_screen', 'sys_sg_calendar_screen', 'sys_sg_custom_map_screen', 'sys_sg_details_screen', 'sys_sg_form_screen', 'sys_sg_parameter_section', ], sys_sg_parameter_screen: [ 'sys_sg_parameter_section', ] };
this.parameterizedConditionBuilders = { sys_sg_data_item: ['query_condition', 'offline_query_condition'], sys_sg_relationship_data_item: ['query_condition', 'offline_query_condition'], sys_sg_write_back_action_item: ['template'], sys_sg_write_back_action_step: ['template'], };
},
type: 'DuplicateConfigMap' }; ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-08 19:43:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8711c6b3536221104078ddeeff7b1232</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DuplicateConfigMap</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Mobile App Builder API" source="sn_mab_api">3c64259bc7812010100f2f3bf4c2609a</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Mobile App Builder API">3c64259bc7812010100f2f3bf4c2609a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8711c6b3536221104078ddeeff7b1232</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-08 19:43:39</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
